Class Credit

java.lang.Object
com.banksystem.Account
com.banksystem.Credit
public class Credit extends Account
Represents a credit account where the balance is negative, with a set credit limit.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.banksystem.Account

    accountNumber, balance, transactionLog
